price: Na kila mtu tumemfungia a'mali yake shingoni mwake. Na Siku ya Kiyama tutamtolea kitabu atakacho kikuta kiwazi kimekunjuliwa.
arabic: وَكُلَّ إِنسَٰنٍ أَلۡزَمۡنَٰهُ طَٰٓئِرَهُۥ فِي عُنُقِهِۦۖ وَنُخۡرِجُ لَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ كِتَٰبٗا يَلۡقَىٰهُ مَنشُورًا
footnotes: Na kila mtu tumemfungamanisha na a'mali yake, vitendo vyake, kama koja lilioko shingoni. Na Siku ya Kiyama tutamtolea kitabu kilicho andikwa vitendo vyake vyote. Atakiona kitabu hicho kiwazi iwe wepesi kwake kukisoma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakulla insānin alzamnāhu ṭāirahu fī ʿunuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma al-qiyāmati kitāban yalqāhu manshūran
